title: Oppositional Defiant Disorder (2013 rerun)
description:
RERUN: Kirk talks about oppositional defiant disorder and emotional parenting. 

Review of Duncombe, M. E., Havighurst, S. S., Holland, K. A., & Frankling, E. J. (2012). The contribution of parenting practices and parent emotion factors in children at risk for disruptive behavior disorders. Child Psychiatry and Human Development, 43, 715--733.

The Psychology In Seattle Podcast.

May 17, 2013.

Email: Contact@PsychologyInSeattle.com

List of all episodes: https://psychologyinseattle.squarespace.com/list-of-episodes

Become a patron of our podcast by going to https://www.patreon.com/PsychologyInSeattle

Music by Bread Knife Incident.
